agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    reactor.fn.Consumer<reactor.bus.Event<ParserMessageJSON>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CampaignManager, FeedbackManager, FoodRecommender, InitialInputRecorder, IntentionClassifier, MealAsker, MealRecorder, MenuParser, PortionAsker, UserManager

    @Component
public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements reactor.fn.Consumer<reactor.bus.Event<ParserMessageJSON>>
    Agent: abstract class for chatbot Agent.
